metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6644 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
Bouncy Castle in Android before 5.1.1 LMY49F and 6.0 before 2016-01-01 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application, aka internal bug 24106146.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6644` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbcmail-java - 1.56-1
libbcpg-java - 1.56-1
libbcpkix-java - 1.56-1
libbcprov-java - 1.56-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.56-1').
